name: Psychblast
description:
Psychblast is a strategy game where the player uses their psychic powers of teleportation and activation to open bridges and reach the finish line. High scores are awarded based upon how quickly the level was completed. There are four levels, generally of increasing difficulty. The first and second levels have a built-in tutorial to guide players through how to play.

Made in 10days for the Let's Create Game Jam 2, 11-21 December 2017
